name: DYING TO FIND
description: A moody WebVR piece, where you find yourself stranded in the residues and routines of a past civilization. They may have lost their purpose, but you are dying to find it.

name: THE UNDER PRESENTS
description: In collaboration with Tender Claws. An immersive live theater experience in Virtual Reality.

name: PURPOSE PRO 2
description: In collaboration with Justin Beiber. ThreeJS development for a browser skating game -- skate with Justin!

name: MONSTER OR FRIEND
description: Exploration of Inverse Kinematic animation for procedural creature design in WebVR. Is it a monster or a friend?

name: MELT
description: This is how I feel today. Simulating a melting effect by using compute shaders on position and velocity buffers.

name: FLUX
description: Join the remote revolution. A one month gathering of artists, hackers and technology enthusiasts in vibrant locations around the world.

name: MA
description: In collaboration with Rachel Bungey. Exploring the japanese concept of MA ‚Äúthe interval which gives shape to the whole‚Äù, visually through a VR experience.

name: WIFI SOUNDSCAPES
description: Revealing the intangible dimension of WiFi packets with tcpdump and Foxdot. Data was captured on a road trip from LA to Denver.

name: READ ME
description: An experiment of focus, featuring the anti use of eye tracking in the browser. Made with webgazer.js and three.js.

name: ALCHEMY PAINTER
description: VR color alchemy experience. Mix dynamic fluids in an intuitive and novel way using a virtual syringe.

name: MONSTER WITHIN
description: A short interactive Virtual Reality experience about the unpredictable nature of social acceptance.

name: THREE BODY
description: A WebVR story experience based on the Sci-Fi novel Three Body Problem by Cixin Liu.

name: AI ANIMATION
description: A port of the AI4Animation project to JavaScript. Explores the idea of machine leaning for character animation on the web.

name: GENDERGRAPH
description: Quantifying word gender biases by using machine learning models trained on different media sources.

name: STARLING SIMULATION
description: In collaboration with Small Data Industry. A bird floacking simulation made with three.js.

name: PROCEDURAL IK CRAWLER
description: Evolution of our pet rat :) Exploration of Inverse Kinematic procedural character animation in the browser.

name: ANTICAP
description: Bypass any captive portal and get free WiFi easily üòù Go tool to automate capturing packets in monitor mode and MAC spoofing.

name: STREET SOUNDS
description: Encode an audio message into QR codes that can be posted on a wall as a time capsule. Anyone can decode these QRs with an app for iOS or Android.

name: RELAXATION ROOM
description: Cellular automata pool in a vaporwave room, be careful it bites. Made with three.js.

name: BOX PROJECTED ENVIRONMENT MAPPING
description: A contribution to three.js library showing how to get accurate reflections in room environments.

name: GALACTIC GYPSY
description: Our entry for the 2019 Global Game Jam in Hong Kong. A game about finding your home in an unknown planet.

name: SKINNED MESH IK
description: A contribution to three.ik library showing how to apply IK to a rigged model.

name: GROW YOUR OWN BOT
description: Training pet robots to reach their goals using the OpenAI reinforcement learning framework in the browser.

name: NEUROJAM
description: A bot for FoxDot that takes user drum patterns and turns them into a masterpiece using a machine learning model from the Magenta project.

name: AR GPU PARTICLES
description: A demo of compute shader particles emitting from your device in augmented reality.

name: AURACARIA DREAMS
description: An procedurally generated and animated art piece in three.js, inspired by the auracaria plant that we found in Bogota, Colombia.

name: THREEJS CURVATURE
description: A contribution to three.js library showing how to calculate mesh curvatures from raw geometry data, and use in shaders.

name: 3D TSP HEART
description: An experiment of extending the TSP algorithm to work in 3D over points on the surface of a geometry. Made with three.js.

name: 360 PHOTO TO VIDEO
description: Tool to convert 360 photos into video formats for easy sharing on media platforms. Made with three.js and CCapture.js

name: VERTEX CACHE
description: A demo of bringing Houdini FEM simulations to the browser by storing vertex data in textures.

name: WHIRPOOLS
description: Snays first three.js shader showing a simple geometry ripple effect.

name: PHOTOSPHERES
description: 360 photo gallery of places around San Francisco made with Ricoh camera and three.js

name: TERMINAL PRINTS
description: Browse feminist t-shirt prints from a terminal. $: rm -rf patriarchy.
